message.name: ERR_BPO_ADMINPDPI_MRE_PRIMARY_NOMINEE
message.locale: There should be only one primary nominee link record.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_NAME_DRE
message.locale: A current or future dated delivery pattern with the name "%1s" already exists. Please use a different name.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_BILLING_NAME_DRE
message.locale: A current or future dated billing pattern with the name "%1s" already exists. Please use a different name.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_FV_DELIVERYMETHODID_EMPTY
message.locale: A delivery method must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A product delivery pattern name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_MAXIMUMAMOUNT_LIABILITY
message.locale: This product is of type Liability and does not require a maximum amount.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_FROMDATE_INVALID
message.locale: The From Date that you have entered is not valid because it does not allow a previous delivery pattern to complete. The next valid From Date is "%1d".

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_BILLING_FROMDATE_INVALID
message.locale: The From Date that you have entered is not valid because it does not allow a previous billing pattern to complete. The next valid From Date is "%1d".

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_FROMDATE_INVALID_FUTURE
message.locale: There is a future dated delivery pattern with From Date "%1d" that does not allow this new delivery pattern to complete. The next valid From Date would be "%2d".

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_FROMDATE_EXIST
message.locale: A delivery pattern already exists for the same From Date that you have entered within the same delivery pattern group.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_BILLING_FROMDATE_EXIST
message.locale: A billing pattern already exists for the same From Date that you have entered within the same billing pattern group.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_CANCEL_FUTURE
message.locale: Only future dated delivery patterns can be canceled.
Only future dated delivery patterns can be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_BILLING_CANCEL_FUTURE
message.locale: Only future dated billing patterns can be canceled.
Only future dated billing patterns can be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_CANCEL_FROMDATE_INVALID
message.locale: Canceling this delivery pattern causes the next delivery pattern From Date to become invalid. The next delivery pattern's From Date is "%1d" and a new valid From Date would be "%2d".
Cancelling this delivery pattern causes the next delivery pattern From Date to become invalid. The next delivery pattern's From Date is "%1d" and a new valid From Date would be "%2d".

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_DEFAULT_CANNOT_BE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: This delivery pattern cannot be set as the default as it has a from date that is in the future.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_BILLING_DEFAULT_CANNOT_BE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: This billing pattern cannot be set as the default as it has a from date that is in the future.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_PRODUCT_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot add a product delivery pattern as this product has been canceled.
You cannot add a product delivery pattern as this product has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_XRV_BILLING_PRODUCT_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot add a product billing pattern as this product has been canceled.
You cannot add a product billing pattern as this product has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_NO_PROD_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: The delivery pattern selected for the product %1s, has no value on %2d. Please select a different delivery pattern for this period.

message.name: ERR_NO_CASE_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: The delivery pattern selected for the case %1n, has no value on %2d. Please select a different delivery pattern for this period.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_FV_COVER_PATTERN_EMPTY
message.locale: A cover pattern must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_FV_DELIVERY_FREQUENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: A delivery frequency must be specified.

message.name: ERR_NO_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE_FOR_PROD
message.locale: No delivery pattern could be found for product "%1s" on date "%2d".

message.name: ERR_PDPI_FV_DELIVERY_METHOD_PRODUCT_TYPE
message.locale: The delivery method must apply to the product type associated with the Delivery Pattern.

message.name: ERR_PDPI_FV_BILLING_METHOD_PRODUCT_TYPE
message.locale: The billing method must apply to the product type associated with the Billing Pattern.

message.name: INF_PDPI_XFV_OFFSET_NO_EFFECT_ONTHE_COVERPATTERN
message.locale: The offset value entered has no effect on the cover pattern being selected.

message.name: INF_PDPI_XFV_OFFSET_NEEDS_TO_SUPPORT_COVERPATTERN
message.locale: The Offset value needs to be set to support the 'N' value in the delivery pattern.
